org.eclipse.eef.properties.ui.internal.page.propertylist

Class EEFTabbedPropertyList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • org.eclipse.eef.properties.ui.internal.page.propertylist.EEFTabbedPropertyList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable

    public class EEFTabbedPropertyList
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
    Shows the list of tabs in the tabbed property sheet page.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INDENT
      The number of spaces used to indent a tab.
      static int NONE
      This constant is used to indicate NONE (for example the index of the currently selected tab).

      • setDynamicImageCount

        public void setDynamicImageCount(java.util.Map<IEEFTabItem,java.lang.Integer> map)
        Sets a map containing an IEEFTabItem as key and number of dynamic images as value. It is used to calculate the width of the widest tab by setting aside enough space (16 pixels per image) for displaying the dynamic images. Individual dynamic images are displayed/removed from a tab by using the showDynamicImage() and hideDynamicImage() methods on the tab's ListElement object.
        Parameters:
        map - The new map of tabs to dynamic image count

      • setElements
